powergrid.model

Class OutOfReachException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • powergrid.model.OutOfReachException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OutOfReachException
extends java.lang.Exception
    An Exception that is thrown when an action involves moving towards an unreachable or non-existing destination.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OutOfReachException()
      Creates a new generic OutOfReachException
      OutOfReachException(Point destination)
      Create a new OutOfReachException with the indicated destination.
      OutOfReachException(Point destination, java.lang.String message)
      Create a new OutOfReachException with the indicated message and destination.
      OutOfReachException(java.lang.String message)
      Create a new OutOfReachException with the indicated message.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point getDestination()
      returns the destination that was out of reach.
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns the message passed along with this OutOfReachException, if it was set, followed by the destination that could not be reached, if it was set.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Throwable

        addSuppressed, fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getStackTrace, getSuppressed, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • OutOfReachException

        public OutOfReachException(Point destination,
                   java.lang.String message)
        Create a new OutOfReachException with the indicated message and destination. The given destination is the destination that could not be reached.
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination that was out of reach
        message - a message indicating the problem

      • OutOfReachException

        public OutOfReachException(Point destination)
        Create a new OutOfReachException with the indicated destination. The given destination is the destination that could not be reached.
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination that was out of reach

      • OutOfReachException

        public OutOfReachException(java.lang.String message)
        Create a new OutOfReachException with the indicated message.
        Parameters:
        message - a message indicating the problem

      • OutOfReachException

        public OutOfReachException()
        Creates a new generic OutOfReachException

    • Method Detail

      • getDestination

        public Point getDestination()
        returns the destination that was out of reach. If no destination was set, this method returns null
        Returns:
        the destination that was out of reach

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns the message passed along with this OutOfReachException, if it was set, followed by the destination that could not be reached, if it was set.
        Overrides:
        getMessage in class java.lang.Throwable
        Returns:
        the message describing the cause of the OutOfReachException
